data.text:
@prettydarntall @EVincentelli I'd say the flawed logic is valuing celebrity over knowledge, experience & expertise.

Conservative or Liberal
Male or Female
Crass or Cultured
Unqualified is still unqualified.

Be best if we learn from these mistakes rather than repeating them.

@WWMisleader @EVincentelli So, Completely Unqualified in Every Way Trump got the job and is metaphorically burning down the offc of the presidency, ergo no more celebrities?  
Flawed logic, I must say, but once again, looks like Trump’s ruining everything for everybody! 😖 #redvelvetrope #polisigh

@mike_yaffe @EVincentelli I was just thinking that very thing! And Sonny Bono (ahem) and Clint Eastwood (armpit fart) and Gofer from “The Love Boat” (epic belchhh.) 
Oh hang on, those were all  Republican white men! So maybe that was OK.
@sglobus @EVincentelli 😂😂😂

@whatstherukkus @sharam123 @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Thank you for still not answering a very simple question in any which way you would like except for asking a different question? You didn't answer the question in any shape or form. I guess hard to expect more from an anonymous account
@whatstherukkus @sharam123 @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli I want you to answer the question you were asked. Not deflect it. Very simple. Can you?
@goat_thrower @EVincentelli bruno
@EVincentelli Oh a little sexism in the morning from the man who wouldn’t be where he is without his father’s name. Not a good move @NYGovCuomo

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli There's no requirement that people start from the bottom and work their way up when running for office. (See Trump, Donald)
She just has to prove to the voters that she's qualified.

@whatstherukkus @sharam123 @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Why not answer the question straight up? Instead deflect it use your 840 characters+ for bunch of irrelevant stuff. Yes, something is very “obvious” about you.
@EVincentelli No more celebrities
@EVincentelli I would venture to guess that Ms. Nixon only wants to be treated fairly, and as an equal.
@mike_yaffe @EVincentelli Ummm, they're just fine with a reality tv host in the White House. Hypocrisy all around - it's the ONE thing the GOP is really good at.

@whatstherukkus @sharam123 @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Which other blatant racists you’d like to denounce now, from the current administration, before you come out as a hypocrite?

@modestpassion @bret_foltz @EVincentelli Indeed.  An actual progressive would be holding elections already, instead of keeping seats empty to prop up the power of the _opposition party_!  
It's a betrayal to the Democratic party to do this.
@mifarandolph @whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Working in government doesn't make one a politician.  Running for office makes one a politician.
@sglobus @EVincentelli *mic drop* 😂😂😂
@EVincentelli @andreamullins84 Says the guy riding his father's coat tails.
@EVincentelli Name recognition is only a valid tool for the political aristocracy!

@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Just poor reading skills &/or faulty logic on your part. Nobody said anything about power. Orig comment was about celebrities skipping “service” legislative positions & going straight to the top office. Your attempted dig at Hillary failed bc she ran for the legislature first.
@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli No, not like that at all. The senate is a legislature, not the boss.

@TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Voting comes down to putting in the person you feel will best advocate for the issues you care about and be smart enough to choose the right people to advise them. Period.
@GarretHutchens @rycaldwell @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Garret if you changed Cynthia’s name to Steve his comment was still condescending.
@EVincentelli I like what he said. Humor to deflect a bs question is not condescending....
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon ....andrew cuomo has literally never had a non-politically appointed job in his entire life
@sharam123 @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Talking to that person is like talking to a wall. All his comments come through the tunnel vision of ignorance, misogyny and self importance.
@EVincentelli ...Remind me how Andrew Cuomo rose to the top of the gubernatorial race, again?
@bret_foltz @EVincentelli Read up on the IDC in the NY state senate

@bret_foltz @EVincentelli Assuming you're asking in good faith, Cuomo conspires with Senate Republicans to keep them in power, and then takes credit for progressive reforms he can't stop. NY has the demographics to be far more progressive than it is
@EVincentelli Said the man who is the son of a famous governor.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon you never answered the questions
@rycaldwell @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Called out for what? Telling the truth? I am ok with that!
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon hey garret, Don’t feign shock and try to deflect when you are called out.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon You know "buzzword" is a buzzword, right?
@evincentelli your Tweet was quoted in an article by @ringer  https://t.co/uo20k4sRxf
@EVincentelli @GarretHutchens @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Cuomo s father was smarter than his two hoys
@EVincentelli Wow that's pretty snide.
@EVincentelli Are there rules about who can run based on prior occupation? Until there are, Cuomo can zip it.
@jaristmtrs @EVincentelli So what experience do u have other than having a twitter account?  Apparently I can’t even google.
@whatstherukkus @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli You don’t need to be a fan to acknowledge someone’s accomplishments. Well, most people can.
@whatstherukkus @mifarandolph @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Obviously. Thanks for proving the work we need to do to fight your misogyny.
@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli You mean like women who have their own successes and ambitions apart from their husbands?  Thanks for the proof of continued mysoginy.
@cruseam @EVincentelli Some experience of something!!!!
@EVincentelli Cuomo is billy joel's daughters godfather so I am pretty sure he can convince him to stay out of the race
@turnercampdave @EVincentelli As I’m not a New Yorker, however, I don’t really have an opinion about whether Ms. Nixon would nevertheless be better than Mr. Cuomo, who seems to have many detractors.

@turnercampdave @EVincentelli I’m not sure she has to start at the bottom (because I don’t know what that is. Is it city council?), but I agree that starting as the chief executive of a very populous state or a country is not ideal.
@EVincentelli Thank goodness Cuomo didn't benefit from name recognition.
@Ichellemay78 @EVincentelli Why can’t we expect both? All the qualities you describe plus political experience (which, as should be obvious by now, is essential)?
@EVincentelli He should be condescending. Just what we need is another celebrity. How has Trump worked out so far? 😋

@EVincentelli @GarretHutchens @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Wow, this attitude really does piss me off. Oh the irony of using name recognition.  I remember your father who was, clearly, a much better man than the son he begat.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Governor Cuomo—where have I heard that name before?
@EVincentelli This would hold a little more water if it weren't coming from the son of a former governor and Democratic party scion.
@EVincentelli It’s called a sense of humor...as in funny....satire..etc.

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Only if you see things from a biased anti Hillary point of view. But I get it that no matter what, you’ll never give her credit for her accomplishments and will always put down her work.  Have a good day.
@TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli doesn't that reinforce the institution of a political class, and gate-keeper...-ism? -itis? how does that jibe with actual democratic representation?
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon https://t.co/u2PCLqxkOS
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Notice that @CynthiaNixon isn’t the one whining. And you, sir, made this about gender. Why?
@AdamFC @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Nothing I said has been disproven! Only a bunch of silly comments like yours!
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Great line from Gov. Cuomo, who got name recognition for being the son of Mario Cuomo.
@EVincentelli Damn, I'm kind of rooting for Cynthia Nixon now.
@EVincentelli @GarretHutchens @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Ditto Chris Cuomo on CNN.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon How rich that someone with the name "Cuomo" tries to slap a someone for using Name Recognition for political gains🙄
@EVincentelli Says the man who owes everything in his political career to his well known father, the former governor.

@EVincentelli Sure, it must be condescending to point out an opponent's complete and total lack of qualifications...

Zero experience has worked out so well in Washington, right?
@TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli How do you feel about Trump?
@EVincentelli People know and love Cynthia Nixon.  I predict Governor Nixon.  Need a woman like her for N.Y. ... good luck Cynthia. #CynthiaNixon

@LenlightenedH @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Oh PLEASE! Every time a man is accused of being condescending to a woman it’s a buzzword! You know it Everyone knows it! When Trump was saying things about Rubio and Bush he was just Trump but when he said something about Fiorina all hell broke loose! Lie to yourself if you want!
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Cuomo has the job because of his dad's name ID , don't forget

@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Did I miss the part where rival politicians glove up and box?  This is supposed to be about ideas and action, not your imagined beat down of a woman. https://t.co/Us31zHpQYE
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Dude! https://t.co/dtl9fHRwwK
@EVincentelli Or Donald Trump...? 🙄
@EVincentelli I guess “Tappan Zee Bridge” lacked name recognition until the Governor put his fathers moniker on it?
@EVincentelli I love Ms Nixon. I’m not sure America is ready for any more stars. Maybe start at bottom and get some experience!
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon What makes you think she wants to be treated ‘like a man’ - what does that even mean? Wow. #sexist

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Women with ambition understand Hillary. She always knew what she was capable of, even when the political circles she lived in just wanted her to shut up about children's healthcare, take Bill's name, smile for cameras and bake cookies. I respect her refusal.

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli 21% of the Senate is women. 21/100. If you're a dude who wants to be a Senator, you don't even have to have a background in law. Or you can work your way up through local ranks and wait your turn. Those women, trust me, burned with ambition to get there before they died waiting.

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Meanwhile, he always said from early in their relationship that he expected HER to be the rising star, for her intelligence and attention to details in policy-making. But she'll always be the one accused of marrying to advance her prospects, because we only understand hoopskirts.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon Cuomo is a giant piece of shit and I can’t wait to vote him out. Have fun in Bavaria not voting in this one.
@GarretHutchens @EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon You didn’t understand her question did you? https://t.co/zZMvpV1yGo

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Hills has been around such a long time, ppl like to forget there was very little pathway available for an ambitious political woman of her generation. She was blamed for Bill losing a campaign for gov because she didn't take his last name, undercutting his manhood or some BS.

@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli About 8-10% of the Senate has been made up of people who never held any prior elected office -- including Ted Cruz and Rand Paul, who doesn't even a background in law, which, I don't know, might be useful in a job where what you're doing is lawmaking.
@Amore_Amore2017 @EVincentelli Does she have anything to say? I don't care if she a celebrity or not, if she's got good ideas, and she's not a sleaze or traitor to Russian mob.
@EVincentelli Bitchy much?

@EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon You accused the governor of condescending to her! We all know that those are buzzwords! Don’t feign shock and try to deflect when you are called out. Politics is Politics!
@angelacobb @EVincentelli Barrrf!

@GarretHutchens @NYGovCuomo @CynthiaNixon What does running for office have to do with wanting to be treated like a man? Only men run for office? Also: Cuomo rode in on his father's coattails and is where he is largely due to his own name recognition in NY state.
@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Yeah, but she discredited her hubby's dickees, so she "earned" it.

@EVincentelli @NYGovCuomo pointing out a truth is not condescending! Besides this politics and if @CynthiaNixon can’t stand the heat get out of the kitchen! If @CynthiaNixon wants to be treated like a man than she better be able to take punches like a man!
@EVincentelli  https://t.co/rBBuXURwlt
@EVincentelli Plenty of voters will recognize that her name is "Not Andrew Cuomo"
@whatstherukkus @AyeTeaGuy @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli No, it is not. She was a politician in her own right due to her work in government before being elected.
@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Should get your “facts” straight.
@jaristmtrs @EVincentelli If she were a male reality tv star, she could be president.
@EVincentelli Out of touch politician cause Pitt and Jolie live mostly in LA and Billy Joel couldn't beat Jay-Z in a primary
@EVincentelli Oh I see, he wants it to be a tight race.
@EVincentelli It’s ridiculous to think you can be governor just because you were an actor, when you really ought to become governor because your dad did that once.
@EVincentelli He’s a jerk to say this. But Billy Joel as New York Governor...I’d take that!

@EVincentelli How corrupt is Cuomo?

Cuomo is as corrupt as a Republican.
@EVincentelli At least she made a name for herself. He's running for the job his dad had.
@EVincentelli i'd vote for Angelina, especially if she would consider producing my novel #Cuomo
@EVincentelli Hope he loses!
@EVincentelli Which is all you need to know to bounce the man. As if there wasn’t already ample evidence.

@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli I agree on the policy point and Cuomo, still I think it's good to remember that not everyone shares our level of progressiveness and that we should be interested in building a coalition with all Democrats.  I live in CA as well (The 17th, Ro Khanna's district.).
@foomper @EVincentelli and Schwarteneggar...and Jesse Ventura...
@heatherkaywood @EVincentelli Amen!
@EVincentelli The only reason this dufus has a job is because his dad was a great governor. He needs to shut up and do his job.

@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli It's not an elected position, it's still highly political in the way Hillary represented it.  Either way, I think we're in agreement with the idea that it's stupid to say she should seek lesser office first.  That said, she still has nowhere near the experience HRC had.

@whatstherukkus @TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Cynthia Nixon has a lot of advocate experience and is knowledgeable, but if this is a dig at Hillary, she had a J.D. from Yale, practiced for years, had experience working with the House Judiciary during Watergate, and was FL of a state and the US. It's not comparable.
@MaggieSkitty @jaristmtrs @EVincentelli He was definitely being sarcastic, but he was being sarcastic about her name recognition being her only qualification.
@EVincentelli Trump traded on name recognition from day 1. He has no ability to work within our constitutional framework. He’s shown that.
@EVincentelli I think NY needs a third choice. Both Cuomo and Nixon are cringeworthy.
@MaggieSkitty @jaristmtrs @EVincentelli Lawyers are a dime a dozen. Cuomo got to where he is because he's the scion of a NY political dynasty.  Mocking Cynthia's name recognition is really stupid.
@EVincentelli Oh really, Andrew CUOMO? 🤔

@MaggieSkitty @jaristmtrs @EVincentelli And having the last name of Cuomo didn't help at all, right?  I see his point about Cynthia Nixon, but he's gotten pretty far on his name.  So he should probably shut up about name recognition.
@brianbeirne @EVincentelli I think that’s the “connection to the endeavor” part. Sounds he’s saying governance is hereditary.
@EVincentelli Anyone else hoping they do?!
@EVincentelli But trump was a reality TV idjut. Js
@goat_thrower Wouldn't you think it's more of a Miranda thing to say? Which is ironic, of course.
@EVincentelli that is such a samantha thing to say
@jaristmtrs @EVincentelli What experience did Cuomo bring other than being the child of a career politician?
@EVincentelli Says the guy who only has a political career because his last name is Cuomo.
@TeeTweetsHere @EVincentelli Yeah, a lot of people have that trouble with the President.
@EVincentelli Same kind of cracks were being made when Reagan ran for Governor of CA.
@EVincentelli Is this Andrew **CUOMO**?

@EVincentelli Even though he has more money and contacts, he should be worried. She can’t just be written off. She’s smart and well educated. And her commitment to public service appears (at least so far as I can tell, right now) to be sincere.
@EVincentelli What experience does she bring other than as an actress?
@EVincentelli I so have issues with celebrities who want to leapfrog over real service positions to become the boss. She should run for state legislature first.
@EVincentelli Is he not even smart enough to realize how many women's votes he lost with one sentence? #Moron
@EVincentelli  https://t.co/hP2xxxlk5l
@EVincentelli He lacks enough self-awareness to know he was elected on his father’s name. She’s burdened with the political name “Nixon.”
